titleStmt.title: Upon the stately structure of Bow-Church and steeple, burnt, an. 1666, rebuilt, 1679, or, A second poem upon nothing
titleStmt.author: Rochester, John Wilmot, Earl of, 1647-1680.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing (2nd ed.) to John Wilmot, Earl of Rochester.

Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
